channel.title: Npc dropping coinds [PI]
channel.description: Okay, say you kill an npc and it drops coins. How would I make it so it doesn't drop the coins and goes directly into a money pouch that's around the mini map. I have it saving, I just need to know what method in NPCHandler.java I would use for this to work.

dropItems(int i) {

Just add a check inside there, and if it’s true then redirect the method to your void and return the dropitems void.
